title: Siri Karlsson - Gran Fuego 2011
description:
Siri Karlsson is a Swedish duo consisting of Cecilia Osterholm on nyckelharpa (key fiddle) and Maria Arnqvist on alto saxophone. We play our own instrumental folk/progressive version of Swedish folk music. For our latest album, Gran Fuego (release 27 April 2011), we invited who we believed would be the perfect producer to help us fulfill our vision, Jari Haapalainen. And indeed he did! Together we invited great guest musicians to join. Tomas Hallonsten (organ), Josef Kallerdahl (bass), Pelle Lindroth alias Parken (voc), Simon SvÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤rd (git), Martin SÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶rbom (git, perc) and finally Jari Haapalainen (dr). Live we perform either as duo or with guests.

Siri Karlsson was formed in 2002, starting with a tour in Brazil. In 2005-06 we took off for another adventure, a one month tour in Mali and Burkina Faso in West Africa. We had the pleasure to jam and perform with some of Mali and Burkinas greatest artists such as Toumani Diabate and Solo Dja Kabako. If it werent for already booked gigs in Sweden we would have stayed further, invited by Tiken Jah Fakoly to open for his stadium concert at Stade de Bamako!

In 2008 we released our debut album Mellan TrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤den (Tombola Records). For this album we invited two of our favorite musicians, Tuomo Haapala, composer and musical innovator on acoustic bass, and Eric Malmberg on hammond organ, known from Sagor & Swing. (sirikarlsson.com)
